biz.paluch.logging.gelf

Class GelfMessageAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.paluch.logging.gelf.GelfMessageAssembler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HostAndPortProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MdcGelfMessageAssembler

    public class GelfMessageAssembler
extends Object
implements HostAndPortProvider
    Creates GelfMessage based on various LogEvent. A LogEvent encapsulates log-framework specifics and exposes commonly used details of log events.
    Since:
    26.09.13 15:05
    Author:
    Mark Paluch
